const KanjiDetails = ({ kanji }) => { return (
{kanji.meaning}
Onyomi
{kanji.onyomi.join("、")}
Kunyomi
{kanji.kunyomi.join("、")}
{kanji.components.length > 0 &&
Components
{kanji.components.join("、")}
}
) } export default KanjiDetails
